name: Content Calendar
description: Plan and Manage Your Content Calendar in NotionPlan your social media content across multiple platforms all in one place. Unlimited Channels: Manage content for Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, LinkedIn, YouTube, TikTok, and more, all in one place. Content Tracking: Plan and track all your social media content from idea to published, ensuring you never miss a post.

enhancedContent.overview: A comprehensive Notion template designed to streamline social media content planning and publishing workflows across multiple platforms. Perfect for content creators, marketers, and social media managers who need centralized oversight of their content strategy. Transforms chaotic content creation into an organized, trackable system that ensures consistent posting schedules.
problemsSolved: Scattered content planning across multiple tools and platforms
Missing posting deadlines and inconsistent content schedules
Difficulty tracking content performance and publication status across channels
solutionsBenefits: Centralized hub for managing all social media content in one organized workspace
Complete visibility of content pipeline from initial concepts to published posts
Streamlined workflow that prevents missed deadlines and content gaps
idealFor: Social media managers handling multiple brand accounts
Content creators publishing across various platforms
Small business owners managing their social presence
notRecommendedFor: Users needing automated posting features (this is planning-focused)
Teams requiring advanced analytics and reporting tools

faqs.question: Can I customize this template?
faqs.answer: Yes, the template is fully customizable. You can add your own platforms, modify content categories, and adjust the workflow stages to match your specific needs.

faqs.question: Do I need Notion AI to use this?
faqs.answer: No, this template works with any Notion plan and doesn't require AI features to function effectively.

faqs.question: How complex is the setup?
faqs.answer: Very straightforward - the template comes pre-configured and ready to use. Simply duplicate it to your workspace and start adding your content ideas.

faqs.question: Is this updated for 2026?
faqs.answer: Yes, this template incorporates current social media platforms and modern content planning best practices.

faqs.question: What if I need help?
faqs.answer: The template includes setup instructions and usage guidelines to get you started quickly.
